DPRK Ambassador to Nigeria Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Nigeria Appointed  
   Pyongyang, September 20 (KCNA) -- Ri Chan Ho was appointed as DPRK ambassador e.p. to Nigeria, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.
